name: The Negotiator
description:
Thank you for taking the time to play my game for the compo category. I am delighted to have had some time to participate in this edition! 

For those who don't know the Ludum Dare compo modality, it's about  making a game in just 48 hours by yourself, creating all the programming and resources in that lapse of time.

In this game, you play as a negotiator. Your mission is simple: 

You have to keep the connection alive long enough for our IT team to trace the call

 We trust you, you are our last hope

*Avalible in Spanish and English

Tools used:

  • Unity 2019.3
  • Blender
  • Audacity
  • BfxR

Follow me on Twitter @beleitax
